item_category: The Galaxy S10+ is the ultimate expression of everything a phone should be. It's the culmination of a decade of S series innovation. With 2 front cameras and 3 rear cameras, it captures moments exactly as you see them. A new ultra-wide and ultra-zoom lens lets you see the whole scene, and a front-facing portrait lens will help you take flawless photos. It's even got an incredible screen-to-body ratio and packs a powerful battery.
review_title: Great phone - son very happy with it
It’s a smart phone everyone could dream about
review_text: I bought this a month ago and amso happy that I did , Excellent
Great reliable phone great size too.
Happy to Purchased this phone to help and save environment.it was refurb but  absolutely like new.
My son really wanted an S10 and as you can’t buy a new one we got this refurbished one, but you wouldn’t know it was other than it’s not in a Samsung box.
It is a smart phone everyone one could dream of
